title: Glendale, California
summary: Glendale is a city in the Verdugo Mountains[9] region of Los Angeles County, California. As of the 2010 census it had a population of 191,719,[10] and as of the 2020 U.S. Census the population was estimated at 196,543,[7] making it the fourth-largest city in Los Angeles County and the 23rd-largest city in California. It is located about 10 miles (16Â km) north of downtown Los Angeles.
